basics.label: Project Manager and Technical Implementation
basics.summary: Systems architect with expertise in requirement gathering and analysis, architectural, component and interface design and development for AS/400 applications in multiples domains. Willing to learn new skills and take on new challenges.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Managed AS/400 CORE BANKING, established compatibility with third-party software products, developed & implemented complex internet and intranet applications, coordinated with systems partners, provided maintenance and development of bug fixes and patch sets for existing web apps, troubleshoot UNIX and Windows processing problems, managed documentation on start-up, shut down and first-level troubleshooting, design strategic plan for component development practices.

work.name: Company Name
